newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers held up by pre-Christmas buying.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers held up by pre-Christmas buying.

text.p: Singapore bunker indications on Friday were far apart but levels remained firm, riding on back of pre-Christmas demand, traders said.
Bunker 180-cst was quoted at $133 per tonne and 380-cst at $127 by majors. Independents were at $130 and $124-$125.
"We are still expecting prices to firm early next week," a trader said. "Regional bunker prices in Thailand and South Korea were also strong," another trader said.
MDO and gas oil were at $238-$245, $255-$263 respectively. --Singapore Newsroom (+65-870-3082)
